Container.Name: cueconverter
Container.Overview: Monitors a folder and automatically splits .cue + .flac albums into individual tagged FLAC tracks. Requires qBittorrent configured with: touch "%F/.complete" in Run on torrent finished.

Config.Name: Downloads Path
Config.Description: Path to the folder to monitor for .cue+.flac albums

Config.Name: Poll Interval
Config.Description: Seconds between each scan for new .cue files

Config.Name: Marker Filename
Config.Description: Filename that signals a download is complete
